text:
What's up, guys?
It's Mallory!

- And Alfred!
- Mallory: I bet you never knew

that you could have
your own wilderness adventure

right here
in Walt Disney World.

Alfred: We love to be in nature
as much as we love
to be in Walt Disney World.
So we're going to show you...
Both: How we Disney!

There are so many
different ways to connect

- with nature here, like...
- ( buzzing )
Mallory: Archery.

- Birdwatching. 
- ( bird squawking )
Alfred: Biking.

- Hey, Alfred!
- ( bell ringing )

- Alfred: Horseback riding. 
- ( neighs )
Canoeing.
Mallory: Hiking.
Pooling.

Then we can step right
out of nature
into our own private cabin

where you're definitely
not roughing it.
We get to be in these cabins.

It's so nice.
We got a nice big kitchen.

I mean, we're basically
out here camping,
but really, we're glamping.

Alfred:
Definitely, it's awesome.

On "Bunk'd,"
we have our cabins,

but I don't think they're
anything as cool as these.
It's been a blast.
Ooh. Back out in nature.

And then, who knew about
the Hoop-Dee-Doo Musical Revue?
Uh, we do!
Ready? Let's do it!

You can enjoy
some nice tasty food

- and an amazing show. 
- Whoo!
Alfred: All the dancing.

- That was so much fun.
- Yeehaw!

And you can even take a boat
to the park from here.

- Oh, yeah, you can!
- Let's go!

♪ Come on,
let's get out of here ♪
♪ Come on, come on ♪
Let's go, I can't wait!

Alfred: It's like having
the magic of Disney...

Mallory: And nature right
at your doorstep.

It's really just like you're out
camping with your friends.

Alfred:
Yeah, I think it's awesome.

I think it really helps
you appreciate nature.

Whoa! Who knew you could
see fireworks from here?

Mallory: Who knew how amazing
this would be?
Oh, of course those guys did.

Announcer: You can go
on your own outdoor adventure
at the all-new cabins

at Disney's
Fort Wilderness Resort.
That's how we Disney!
How do you Disney?
